quiz.question: _____ fallibility
quiz.explanation: 易犯错性; 易错性, 人类易错性. Human fallibility means we all make mistakes. 人类易错性意味着我们都会犯错。

quiz.question: susceptibility __ _______
quiz.explanation: 易感性; 敏感性, 对疾病的易感性. Genetics affects susceptibility to disease. 遗传影响对疾病的易感性。

quiz.question: ____ humility
quiz.explanation: 谦逊; 谦虚, 表现谦逊. Great leaders show humility. 伟大的领导者表现谦逊。

quiz.question: _________ virility
quiz.explanation: 男子气概; 生殖力, 男性的男子气概. Sports celebrate masculine virility. 体育运动颂扬男性的男子气概。

quiz.question: ____ motility
quiz.explanation: 运动性; 活动力, 细胞运动性. Biologists study cell motility under microscopes. 生物学家在显微镜下研究细胞运动性。

quiz.question: _____ __ futility
quiz.explanation: 徒劳; 无用, 徒劳感. He felt a sense of futility about the project. 他对这个项目感到徒劳。

quiz.question: _____ tranquility
quiz.explanation: 宁静; 平静, 乡村宁静. They enjoyed the rural tranquility. 他们享受乡村宁静。

quiz.question: civility ___ ________
quiz.explanation: 礼貌; 谦恭, 礼貌和礼节. Treat everyone with civility and courtesy. 以礼貌和礼节对待每个人。

quiz.question: _____ incredulity
quiz.explanation: 怀疑; 不轻信, 表达怀疑. She began to voice incredulity at the claims. 她开始对这些说法表达怀疑。

quiz.question: ______ sedulity
quiz.explanation: 勤勉; 勤奋, 顽强的勤勉. His dogged sedulity led to success. 他顽强的勤勉导致了成功。

quiz.question: _______ garrulity
quiz.explanation: 多嘴; 唠叨, 无休止的唠叨. His endless garrulity bored everyone. 他无休止的唠叨让每个人都感到厌烦。

quiz.question: _____________ amity
quiz.explanation: 友好; 和睦, 国际友好. Nations strive for international amity. 各国努力争取国际友好。

quiz.question: _______ calamity
quiz.explanation: 灾难; 灾祸, 自然灾害. The earthquake was a natural calamity. 地震是一场自然灾害。

quiz.question: ____ magnanimity
quiz.explanation: 宽宏大量, 表现宽宏大量. Winners should show magnanimity. 获胜者应该表现宽宏大量。

quiz.question: ________ equanimity
quiz.explanation: 镇定; 沉着, 保持镇定. She managed to maintain equanimity under pressure. 她在压力下设法保持镇定。

quiz.question: ______ __ comity
quiz.explanation: 礼让; 友好, 友好精神. Diplomats work in a spirit of comity. 外交官以友好精神工作。

quiz.question: ________ conformity
quiz.explanation: 一致; 遵从, 文化一致性. Social pressure enforces cultural conformity. 社会压力强制执行文化一致性。

quiz.question: ___ enormity __ ___ ____
quiz.explanation: 巨大; 严重性, 任务的巨大性. They realized the enormity of the task. 他们意识到任务的巨大性。

quiz.question: _______ anonymity
quiz.explanation: 匿名; 无名, 保护匿名. Journalists protect anonymity of sources. 记者保护消息来源的匿名。

quiz.question: sanity _____
quiz.explanation: 神智正常; 明智, 理智检查. Do a sanity check on your work. 对你的工作做理智检查。

quiz.question: ________ insanity
quiz.explanation: 精神错乱; 疯狂, 刑事精神错乱. The defense claimed criminal insanity. 辩方声称刑事精神错乱。

quiz.question: _____ vanity
quiz.explanation: 虚荣; 自负, 纯粹的虚荣. His actions were driven by sheer vanity. 他的行为完全由虚荣驱动。

quiz.question: ______ amenity
quiz.explanation: 便利设施; 舒适设备, 现代便利设施. The hotel offers modern amenity. 酒店提供现代便利设施。

quiz.question: _____ dignity
quiz.explanation: 尊严; 庄严, 人的尊严. Human dignity must be respected. 人的尊严必须受到尊重。

quiz.question: __ ___ vicinity
quiz.explanation: 附近; 邻近, 在附近. The store is in the vicinity. 商店就在附近。

quiz.question: affinity ___
quiz.explanation: 亲和力; 喜好, 对...的喜好. She has an affinity for mathematics. 她对数学有喜好。

quiz.question: __ infinity ___ ______
quiz.explanation: 无限; 无穷, 直到无限以及更远. To infinity and beyond! 直到无限以及更远!

quiz.question: ____ indemnity
quiz.explanation: 赔偿; 保障, 寻求赔偿. Victims may seek indemnity for damages. 受害者可以为损害寻求赔偿。

quiz.question: ______ solemnity
quiz.explanation: 庄严; 严肃, 仪式的庄严. The ritual solemnity impressed everyone. 仪式的庄严给每个人留下了深刻印象。

quiz.question: _______ fraternity
quiz.explanation: 兄弟会; 团体, 大学兄弟会. He joined a college fraternity. 他加入了大学兄弟会。

quiz.question: __________ immunity
quiz.explanation: 豁免; 免疫力, 外交豁免权. Ambassadors have diplomatic immunity. 大使享有外交豁免权。

quiz.question: ___ ____ impunity
quiz.explanation: 免罚; 不受惩罚, 不受惩罚地行事. Criminals cannot act with impunity. 罪犯不能不受惩罚地行事。

quiz.question: _____ serendipity
quiz.explanation: 意外发现; 机缘巧合, 幸运的机缘巧合. Their meeting was a happy serendipity. 他们的相遇是幸运的机缘巧合。

quiz.question: ______ solidarity
quiz.explanation: 团结; 一致, 工人团结. Worker solidarity strengthened the union. 工人团结加强了工会。

quiz.question: charity __________
quiz.explanation: 慈善; 施舍, 慈善募捐活动. The charity fundraiser raised thousands. 慈善募捐活动筹集了数千美元。

quiz.question: _____ familiarity
quiz.explanation: 熟悉; 亲密, 密切的熟悉. Close familiarity breeds contempt. 密切的熟悉滋生轻蔑。

quiz.question: _____–_____ polarity
quiz.explanation: 极性; 两极分化, 南北极性. Magnets have north–south polarity. 磁铁有南北极性。

quiz.question: _____________ singularity
quiz.explanation: 奇点; 独特性, 技术奇点. Some predict a technological singularity. 有些人预测技术奇点。

quiz.question: ________ insularity
quiz.explanation: 孤立; 狭隘, 文化孤立. Cultural insularity limits perspectives. 文化孤立限制了视角。

quiz.question: _____ parity
quiz.explanation: 平价; 相等, 价格平价. Price parity ensures fair competition. 价格平价确保公平竞争。

quiz.question: ______ disparity
quiz.explanation: 差异; 不平等, 收入差距. Income disparity is growing. 收入差距正在扩大。

quiz.question: _________ celebrity
quiz.explanation: 名人; 名声, 好莱坞名人. The Hollywood celebrity attended the premiere. 好莱坞名人参加了首映式。

quiz.question: ____ alacrity
quiz.explanation: 敏捷; 乐意, 表现乐意. He accepted with alacrity. 他乐意地接受了。

quiz.question: ________ mediocrity
quiz.explanation: 平庸; 平凡, 文化平庸. Critics decry cultural mediocrity. 批评家谴责文化平庸。

quiz.question: _______ insincerity
quiz.explanation: 不真诚; 虚伪, 明显的不真诚. His blatant insincerity was obvious. 他明显的不真诚是显而易见的。

quiz.question: __________ celerity
quiz.explanation: 迅速; 敏捷, 非凡的迅速. They moved with remarkable celerity. 他们以非凡的迅速行动。

quiz.question: ________ temerity
quiz.explanation: 鲁莽; 冒失, 鲁莽的冒失. His reckless temerity caused problems. 他鲁莽的冒失造成了问题。

quiz.question: ________ prosperity
quiz.explanation: 繁荣; 兴旺, 经济繁荣. Economic prosperity benefits all. 经济繁荣使所有人受益。

quiz.question: _______ austerity
quiz.explanation: 紧缩; 朴素, 战后紧缩. Postwar austerity was difficult. 战后紧缩很困难。

quiz.question: ______ dexterity
quiz.explanation: 灵巧; 敏捷, 手工灵巧. Surgeons need manual dexterity. 外科医生需要手工灵巧。

quiz.question: _____ integrity
quiz.explanation: 正直; 诚实, 道德正直. Politicians should have moral integrity. 政客应该有道德正直。

quiz.question: ___ __ superiority
quiz.explanation: 优越; 优势, 优越感. He spoke with an air of superiority. 他带着优越感说话。

quiz.question: ___ priority
quiz.explanation: 优先; 优先权, 最优先. Safety is our top priority. 安全是我们的最优先事项。

quiz.question: _____ obscurity
quiz.explanation: 默默无闻; 晦涩, 完全默默无闻. The artist died in total obscurity. 艺术家在完全默默无闻中去世。

quiz.question: _____ purity
quiz.explanation: 纯洁; 纯净, 道德纯洁. They valued moral purity. 他们重视道德纯洁。

quiz.question: ____ maturity
quiz.explanation: 成熟; 到期, 贷款到期. The loan maturity date is next year. 贷款到期日是明年。

quiz.question: _______ propensity
quiz.explanation: 倾向; 习性, 天生的倾向. Humans have a natural propensity to learn. 人类有学习的天生倾向。

quiz.question: ______ animosity
quiz.explanation: 仇恨; 敌意, 相互敌意. There was mutual animosity between them. 他们之间有相互敌意。

quiz.question: ____ pomposity
quiz.explanation: 自负; 浮夸, 表现自负. He would often show pomposity. 他经常表现自负。

quiz.question: ___ __ generosity
quiz.explanation: 慷慨; 大方, 慷慨的行为. Her donation was an act of generosity. 她的捐赠是慷慨的行为。

quiz.question: __________ virtuosity
quiz.explanation: 精湛技艺; 艺术鉴赏力, 非凡的精湛技艺. The pianist displayed remarkable virtuosity. 钢琴家展示了非凡的精湛技艺。

quiz.question: _____ entity
quiz.explanation: 实体; 存在, 法律实体. The corporation is a legal entity. 公司是法律实体。

quiz.question: ______ acuity
quiz.explanation: 敏锐; 尖锐, 视觉敏锐度. Visual acuity declines with age. 视觉敏锐度随年龄下降。

quiz.question: perspicuity __ ______
quiz.explanation: 明晰; 清楚, 言语的明晰. The perspicuity of speech impressed listeners. 言语的明晰给听众留下了深刻印象。

quiz.question: ___________ ingenuity
quiz.explanation: 独创性; 聪明才智, 工程独创性. Engineering ingenuity solved the problem. 工程独创性解决了问题。

quiz.question: ____ equity
quiz.explanation: 公平; 资产净值, 房屋净值. Home equity can be used for loans. 房屋净值可以用于贷款。

quiz.question: ______ inequity
quiz.explanation: 不公平; 不平等, 社会不公平. Social inequity must be addressed. 社会不公平必须得到解决。

quiz.question: _____ iniquity
quiz.explanation: 邪恶; 不公正, 严重的邪恶. Slavery was a grave iniquity. 奴隶制是严重的邪恶。

quiz.question: _________ antiquity
quiz.explanation: 古代; 古物, 古典古代. Classical antiquity influenced Western culture. 古典古代影响了西方文化。

quiz.question: _____ incongruity
quiz.explanation: 不协调; 不一致, 滑稽的不协调. The comic incongruity made people laugh. 滑稽的不协调让人发笑。

quiz.question: _____ fatuity
quiz.explanation: 愚蠢; 昏庸, 彻底的愚蠢. The plan showed utter fatuity. 这个计划显示了彻底的愚蠢。

quiz.question: _______ gratuity
quiz.explanation: 小费; 赏金, 服务小费. A service gratuity is added to the bill. 账单中加入了服务小费。

quiz.question: ______ cavity
quiz.explanation: 腔; 蛀洞, 牙洞. The dentist filled the dental cavity. 牙医填补了牙洞。

quiz.question: _____ depravity
quiz.explanation: 堕落; 腐化, 道德堕落. The crime showed moral depravity. 这起犯罪显示了道德堕落。

quiz.question: _______ levity
quiz.explanation: 轻浮; 轻率, 紧张的轻浮. Nervous levity masked his fear. 紧张的轻浮掩盖了他的恐惧。

quiz.question: hyperactivity ________
quiz.explanation: 过度活跃, 过度活跃障碍. ADHD stands for hyperactivity disorder. 多动症代表过度活跃障碍。

quiz.question: _____ productivity
quiz.explanation: 生产力; 生产率, 劳动生产率. Labor productivity affects economic growth. 劳动生产率影响经济增长。

quiz.question: ____ sensitivity
quiz.explanation: 敏感性; 灵敏度, 皮肤敏感性. Some people have skin sensitivity to sunlight. 有些人对阳光有皮肤敏感性。

quiz.question: prolixity __ _____
quiz.explanation: 冗长; 啰嗦, 文体的冗长. The prolixity of style bored readers. 文体的冗长让读者感到厌烦。

quiz.question: ____ __ fealty
quiz.explanation: 忠诚; 效忠, 效忠誓言. Knights swore an oath of fealty. 骑士宣誓效忠。

quiz.question: ___ casualty
quiz.explanation: 伤亡; 受害者, 战争伤亡. He was a war casualty. 他是战争伤亡者。

quiz.question: ____ royalty
quiz.explanation: 版税; 皇室, 书籍版税. Authors earn book royalty from sales. 作者从销售中赚取书籍版税。

quiz.question: novelty ____
quiz.explanation: 新奇; 新颖, 新奇物品. The store sells novelty item. 商店出售新奇物品。

quiz.question: _____ guilty
quiz.explanation: 有罪的, 认罪. The defendant will plead guilty. 被告将认罪。

quiz.question: shanty ____
quiz.explanation: 棚屋; 简陋小屋, 棚户区. Many live in the shanty town. 许多人住在棚户区。

quiz.question: ________ warranty
quiz.explanation: 保证; 保修, 终身保修. The product has a lifetime warranty. 产品有终身保修。

quiz.question: ________ sovereignty
quiz.explanation: 主权; 统治权, 国家主权. Countries protect their national sovereignty. 国家保护其国家主权。

quiz.question: dainty _______
quiz.explanation: 精致的; 娇小的, 纤细的手指. She had dainty fingers. 她有纤细的手指。

quiz.question: _____ certainty
quiz.explanation: 确定; 必然, 道德确信. He spoke with moral certainty. 他以道德确信说话。

quiz.question: flaunty _____
quiz.explanation: 炫耀的; 招摇的, 炫耀的连衣裙. She wore a flaunty dress to the party. 她穿着炫耀的连衣裙去参加聚会。

quiz.question: tasty _____
quiz.explanation: 美味的, 美味的小吃. This is a tasty snack. 这是美味的小吃。

quiz.question: _____ amnesty
quiz.explanation: 特赦; 大赦, 给予特赦. The president will grant amnesty. 总统将给予特赦。

quiz.question: zesty _____
quiz.explanation: 风味浓的; 有活力的, 风味浓的酱汁. The zesty sauce adds flavor. 风味浓的酱汁增添了味道。

quiz.question: feisty ______
quiz.explanation: 精力充沛的; 活跃的, 激烈的辩论. The candidates had a feisty debate. 候选人进行了激烈的辩论。

quiz.question: fusty _____
quiz.explanation: 霉臭的; 陈腐的, 霉臭的阁楼. The fusty attic needed cleaning. 霉臭的阁楼需要清理。

quiz.question: lusty _____
quiz.explanation: 精力充沛的; 健壮的, 热情的欢呼. The crowd gave a lusty cheer. 人群发出热情的欢呼。

quiz.question: musty _____
quiz.explanation: 发霉的; 陈腐的, 霉味. The old books had a musty smell. 旧书有霉味。

quiz.question: natty _______
quiz.explanation: 整洁的; 时髦的, 衣着整洁的人. He's always been a natty dresser. 他一直是衣着整洁的人。

quiz.question: tatty _______
quiz.explanation: 破旧的; 褴褛的, 破旧的衣服. He wore tatty clothes. 他穿着破旧的衣服。

quiz.question: petty _____
quiz.explanation: 琐碎的; 小的, 轻微犯罪. Shoplifting is a petty crime. 入店行窃是轻微犯罪。
